医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为期 18 个月的冥想计划可改善老年人的心理健康由伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 联合领导的国际团队进行的一项新的随机对照试验发现，经过 18 个月的冥想计划可以改善老年人的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=678dee3f-26a8-40f7-bd78-897a3418fdbd Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:48:20 -0500 18-month meditation program improves psychological wellbeing in seniors
不良的童年经历可能会增加年轻人肌肉畸形的几率发表在《临床社会工作杂志》上的一项新研究发现，在 18 岁之前经历过不良童年经历 (ACE) 的青少年和年轻人明显更有可能出现肌肉畸形症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235685fe-9dd9-4fb0-8dd3-9506901dad8e Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:25:28 -0500 Adverse childhood experiences may increase the odds of muscle dysmorphia in young people
脑肽被认为是酗酒的关键因素酒精是世界上最常见的成瘾物质。在美国，过度饮酒每年造成 2,490 亿美元的损失，并导致约 88,000 人死亡，以及各种慢性疾病和社会问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da6aeb59-5587-45d0-9881-1605c66cf037 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:12:04 -0500 Brain peptide identified as key player in heavy alcohol drinking
研究发现关键前列腺癌治疗的利用存在种族差异加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与其他种族和族裔群体（包括白人或拉丁裔男性）相比，被诊断出患有晚期前列腺癌的黑人男性接受新型激素治疗的可能性明显较低治疗已被证明可以有效控制前列腺肿瘤的生长并延长患有该疾病的男性的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42809a34-fa63-4165-933e-75b4fc89cba0 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 13:51:33 -0500 Study finds racial disparity in the utilization of crucial prostate cancer therapy
揭示脂肪酸代谢与糖尿病微循环障碍之间的联系宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。糖尿病是一种慢性代谢性疾病，其特征是胰岛素分泌受损或胰岛素抵抗导致血糖水平升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Unraveling-the-link- Between-fatty-acid-metabolism-and-microcirculatory-impairments-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Unraveling-the-link- Between-fatty-acid-metabolism-and-microcirculatory-impairments-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b0b7ee0-6eab-4ba9-8356-3f719c868b31 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:06:00 -0500 Unraveling the link between fatty acid metabolism and microcirculatory impairments in diabetes
关于优化脊髓损伤患者住房的新见解无法满足残疾人需求的住房可能会产生深远的后果。例如，阻碍独立和社区融合的生活状况可能会对健康和福祉产生长期不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-insights-on-optimizing-housing-for-individuals-with-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-insights-on-optimizing-housing-for-individuals-with-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39f5f7dd-0583-4b15-9827-7192d73dcde2 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:59:00 -0500 New insights on optimizing housing for individuals with spinal cord injury
超分辨率显微镜的新型分子尺：生物成像的突破最新的超分辨率显微镜方法现已实现几纳米范围内的光学分辨率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-molecular-rulers-for-super-resolution-microscopy-A-breakthrough-in-biological-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-molecular-rulers-for-super-resolution-microscopy-A-breakthrough-in-biological-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eaad18c-5b5a-4a6f-ba7f-e00f491df21f Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:54:00 -0500 New molecular rulers for super-resolution microscopy: A breakthrough in biological imaging
使用常规收集的健康数据简化研究的伦理审批：香港案例研究宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。定期收集的健康数据越来越多地用于临床研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Streamlined-Ethics-Approval-for-Research-Using-Routinely-Collected-Health-Data-A-Case-Study-of-Hong-Kong.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Streamlined-Ethics-Approval-for-Research-Using-Routinely-Collected-Health-Data-A-Case-Study-of-Hong-Kong.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc8f5f95-bc80-428f-8cf8-4619a498f930 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:49:00 -0500 Streamlining ethics approval for research using routinely collected health data: A case study of Hong Kong
高水平的尿酸烟草特异性亚硝胺与腹主动脉钙化风险增加有关宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。这项横断面研究是首次对美国成人尿酸烟草特异性亚硝胺 (TSNA)、N'-亚硝基降烟碱 (NNN) 和腹主动脉钙化 (AAC) 之间的关系进行调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/High-levels-of-uric-tobacco-specific-nitrosamine-linked-to-increased-abdominal-aortic-calcification-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/High-levels-of-uric-tobacco-specific-nitrosamine-linked-to-increased-abdominal-aortic-calcification-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a48018e0-3072-4e8f-a2b1-4767ad15ec47 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:41:00 -0500 High levels of uric tobacco-specific nitrosamine linked to increased abdominal aortic calcification risk
新型处方智能手表可准确检测心房颤动随着可穿戴技术的使用不断增长，智能手表在全球范围内向消费者销售，作为监测健康状况的一种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-prescription-smartwatch-accurately-detects-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/New-prescription-smartwatch-accurately-detects-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=094825db-f2c1-4f41-8f4d-a1e519ad2f78 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:34:00 -0500 New prescription smartwatch accurately detects atrial fibrillation
